DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess effect different dose level pneumococcal polysaccharide adjuvant safety immunogenicity V114 healthy adult infant .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability Immunogenicity V114 Healthy Adults Infants ( V114-005 )
DOC.criteria: Adult Cohort : 18 49 year good health Highly unlikely conceive vaccination 6 week administration study vaccine . Infant Cohort : approximately 2 month ( 42 90 day ) good health . Adult cohort : Prior administration pneumococcal vaccine History invasive pneumococcal disease Known hypersensitivity vaccine component Known suspect impairment immune function Coagulation disorder contraindicate intramuscular vaccination Received blood transfusion blood product within 6 month Participated another clinical study investigational product within 2 month Breast feeding . Infant cohort : Prior administration pneumococcal vaccine Known hypersensitivity vaccine component Known suspect impairment immune function History congenital acquire immunodeficiency Has mother document Human Immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection Has mother document hepatitis B surface antigen positive result Functional anatomic asplenia History failure thrive Coagulation disorder contraindicate intramuscular vaccination History autoimmune disease autoimmune disorder Known neurologic cognitive behavioral disorder Received systemic corticosteroid within 14 day Received licensed nonlive vaccine within 14 day Received licensed live virus vaccine within 30 day Received blood transfusion blood product Participated another clinical study investigational product History invasive pneumococcal disease
